Description: I sell unique timepieces, mostly backwards watches with reverse dial or those watches that run counterclockwise. Item: Vintage Seiko Diver's Watch with original and aftermarket parts (parts that no longer work were either repaired or replaced) as follows:  - Original 6309 Japan Automatic Movement with 17 jewels (modified to run backwards) - Aftermarket dial (Reverse 12-Hour Dial) - Aftermarket hour, minute and second hands - Original case (polished) - Original caseback with SN 760792 and 6309-7290 (polished) - Aftermarket laminated bezel insert - Aftermarket crystal  - Aftermarket Seiko watch band - Aftermarket crown/gaskets Condition: Newly serviced, modified and overhauled by a professional/expert to keep time and look as excellent as it is now. Works great! Please check all pictures (what you see is exactly what you'll get). Ask for more pictures if needed 👍🏻 Special Features:  - Mechanical (automatic) w/ 6309 movement;  - 150m water resistant;  - 12-Hour reverse dial - Hands run backwards Missing: No manual/warranty papers.  Shipping: Domestic (Philippines) - P200; International - $50 (shipping only. any custom/import charges to be shouldered by buyer). This item will be shipped via Express. Any questions related to the item? Please don't hesitate to ask. Check my other items for more rare and cool items. Thank you for viewing!
